author: agilliland
msg: struts2 versions of ping target controls, both common and custom.

author: aconway
msg: Resolves: QPID-298, QPID-304: qpidd flags to control broker daemon.
* broker/Daemon.h|cpp: Daemon and pid file management, wrapper for libdaemon.
-d [ --daemon ] - waits till deamon is listening before returning.
--wait SECONDS (=10)              Maximum wait for daemon response.

author: jacopoc
msg: Before a cross-ship return can be approved, a paymentMethodId must be associated on the ReturnHeader.
The payment method is used to guarantee the cross-shipped item.

author: jkuhnert
msg: Resolves TAPESTRY-1415. Had no idea javassist had a static expression syntax using # as the reference between field/method and class name.
